author: akornev
msg: Modified the tests to ensure that connection has been established before proceeding.

author: akornev
msg: code refactoring for JMX enablement. Added ServerStats and QuorumStats classes. Bug fixes: OutOfMemory under heavy load, disk I/O now uses buffered streams, NIOServerCnxn.Factory shuffles the selector keys to avoid starvation. Lots of formatting: replaced tabs with whitespaces, DOS eol style converted to UNIX

author: akornev
msg: Added a new return code to zookeeper_process() -- ZNOTHING -- that
indicates that the socket has no more data to read; updated the unit tests

author: mahadevkonar
msg: changed the tests to be compatible with old junit

author: akornev
msg: Fixed isStandalone() to return true for quorum sizes <= 1
